metadata.title: CVE-2022-29244 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: npm pack ignores root-level .gitignore and .npmignore file exclusiondirectives when run in a workspace or with a workspace flag (ie.`--workspaces`, `--workspace=<name>`). Anyone who has run `npm pack` or`npm publish` inside a workspace, as of v7.9.0 and v7.13.0 respectively,may be affected and have published files into the npm registry they did notintend to include. Users should upgrade to the latest, patched version ofnpm v8.11.0, run: npm i -g npm@latest . Node.js versions v16.15.1,v17.19.1, and v18.3.0 include the patched v8.11.0 version of npm.

criterions.comment: npm package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
